item.description:
July 22nd 7-9pm Buddy Night with NERF:   Garbage Day
In the distant future, the things we discard now will be the greatest of treasures.  Battles rage everywhere to claim the trash of today- it's the best fuel, it's the prettiest art, it's the strongest weapon, it's the most solid defense!    Sanitation technicians, trash collectors, and recyclers are locked in a deadly struggle- who will claim the most cast-offs and win the day?  Grab your NERF blaster and get ready for a 3-way battle royale in the dump.  Ages 10 and up, NERF darts will be provided. Visit  www.guardup.net to pre-register:   $15/member, $20/nonmember Or Call ahead pre-registration (781) 270-4800: $17/member, $22/nonmember At the door registration: $20/member, $25/nonmember
item.name: Guard Up NERF Night: Garbage Day
